Articles.Content:
So with the new atmo system not far away I decided that a fitting sendoff for the old system was in order, this sendoff will celebrate one of the best things about the old system.

Infinigliders!

Rules:

-must contain at least one kerbal

-Stock parts only

-No conventional engines active at the time of screenshot

-An escape or landing system must exist to facilitate the survival of the pilot(s).

-A screenshot must be provided showing speed, as well as an image of the recovery system deployed.

Awards:

-Fastest petronator, 1513.8 M/S

-Most parts.

-Fewest parts

-Troop transport(most kerbals)

My entry:

OP Glider (named after another submission from a bygone challenge)

*High throttle is due to cmd,shift,3 being screenshot on a mac.

-Argon

Edited April 27, 2015 by Argon
New record

Ah, yes, the infiniglider. I sure will miss it.

I went back to my original infiniglider, the Pixie Stick. Turns out, landing is kinda hard in one of these. But, with a few modifications (including a cage to prevent terrified Kerbals from escaping, those slippery devils protect the valuable pilot), the Pixie Stick flies again! I got her up to 1513 m/s and landed Mr. Kerman safely afterward.

My pilot seems a little shaken after the experience.

Edited April 24, 2015 by petronator

alright so here is 1 that is very difficult to stop from shooting into space and loosing all the velocity but it goes the fastest with the least parts here so

Edited April 25, 2015 by caryplane
pic dint send

Errordynamics abuse, hmm... I've gotten a few craft to exceed 6 km/s with this. Unfortunately, whenever I build manned versions, I tend to push them to the limits of sanity, which means they don't generally land intact. More likely, I aim them at the mÃƒÂ¼n and make them go splat.

The tricky part is safely landing something where even the slightest twitch significantly increases your speed. Parachutes are one solution, the other is to break off all your winglets like I did.

I'd like to see how you did 6 km/s though. That sounds insane.
